com.google.api.ads.common.lib.auth

Class OfflineCredentials

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.api.ads.common.lib.auth.OfflineCredentials

  • public class OfflineCredentials
extends Object
    OfflineCredentials offline OAuth2 provider.

    Example usage: 
    
 Credential credential = new OfflineCredentials.Builder()
     .forApi(OfflineCredentials.Api.AD_MANAGER)
     .fromFile()
     .build()
     .generateCredential();
    Generate a refresh token or service account key file and place it in your ads.properties file to be read by this utility.

      A class defining a custom OAuth config.
      static class  OfflineCredentials.ForApiBuilder
      Builder for OfflineCredentials.
      static interface  OfflineCredentials.OAuthConfig
      Interface outlining the values required for OAuth configuration.

      • generateCredential

        public com.google.api.client.auth.oauth2.Credential generateCredential()
                                                                throws OAuthException
        Generates a new offline credential and immediately refreshes it.
        Returns:
        a newly refreshed offline credential.
        Throws:
        OAuthException - if the credential could not be refreshed.
